name: Using MySQL Database with PHP
program:
1)Using PDO to access an SQL-based database with PHP
2)Using MySQLi to access a MySQL database with PHP

name: Django for Everybody
program: This specialization introduces Python programmers to building websites using the Django library. Across the four courses, you will learn HTML, CSS, SQL, Django, JavaScript, jQuery, and JSON Web Services.  During the course, you will build online websites
